Setting it to 0 disables the optimization.'                                                                      | 'UInt64' |

Setting it to 0 means no limit.'                                     | 'UInt64' |

Once the TTL for a cached result has expired, the result is considered stale and will not be used for new queries.' | 'UInt64' |
